title: News24.com | Covid-19: This is not the time to discriminate against migrants, say human rights centres
description: As South Africa fights the coronavirus pandemic, two human rights organisations are calling on the government to "empathetically" make a commitment that no undocumented migrant will be prosecuted when they present themselves for testing or be excluded from th…
content:
The Centre for Human Rights at the University of Pretoria and the Centre for Applied Legal Studies at the University of the Witwatersrand are deeply concerned about migrants in South Africa.
As the country fights the coronavirus pandemic, both centres are ca… [+1975 chars]
